task.title: How to Restore a Password?
task.shortdesc: Find instructions on how to reset the password for your Mail App account.

taskbody.prereq: You have to have an account in the Mail App. If you don't have one, see the page.

context.p: If your're hacing trouble logging into your existing account, you can reset your password.

taskbody.result: You will be redirected to the Log In page where you can enter your user name and new password.
